data.text: http://www.angelfire.com/art2/jungstilling/Monastery1.htm Search: The Web Angelfire Report Abuse « Previous | Top 100 | Next » Copyright 2000 Daniel H. Shubin share: del.icio.us | digg | reddit | furl | facebook MONASTERY PRISONS The History of Russian Orthodox Monasteries as Prisons, the Inmates Incarcerated there, the Intolerance of Imperial Russia, and the Struggle for Orthodox Supremacy. 1. Preface 2. Monastery Prisons 3. Solovetski Island Monastery 4. Solovetski Monastery Inmates 5. Suzdal Spasso-Evfimiev Monastery 6. Spasso-Evfimiev Monastery Inmates 7. Lesser Monasteries and their Inmates 8. Convents and their Inmates 9. Epilogue by Daniel H. Shubin TABLE OF CONTENTS DEDICATION This book is dedicated to all the innocent victims of incarceration in a monastery prison, those whose names are in this book and those whose names are lost in history, none of whom should have been subjected to such trial of body and mind and conscience by religious and secular authority. http://www.angelfire.com/art2/jungstilling/Monastery1.htm (1 of 89) [8/27/2008 10:48:34 AM]
